document.full_text: australia's qantas airways  said it expects to cut around 350 of its cabin crew jobs, or 5 percent of total, under a voluntary redundancy program as the airline seeks to reduce costs to offset higher fuel prices.
document.title: australia's qantas offers redundancies to cabin crew
lines_and_colors: australia's qantas airways  said it expects to cut around 350 of its cabin crew jobs, or 5 percent of total, under a voluntary redundancy program as the airline seeks to reduce costs to offset higher fuel prices.
